page.title: 16Computing in Pateley
page.content: In Pateley Bridge there is a computer software company called Microtrend U.K., which is owned by a Dutch company. They produce business software and employ twelve people in Pateley. They have been producing software in their present offices for two and a half years. These are in the Council Chambers, King Street. The company are based in Pateley because the first programmer for Microtrend lived in the area. It is a perfect place for producing business software because all the necessary ingredients are here. These include such things as electicity, computers, peace and quiet and a regular postal service.The software is supplied to many countries throughout Europe in nine different languages, although most of them are in English, German, French and Dutch.
